availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on October 1, 1820. Lived in Knottsville, Davies County, Kentucky. Worked as a Carpenter and Postmaster. Died on January 1, 1896.

bibl.p: D. D. T. Leech, Post Offices in the United States and Names of Postmasters on the 1st of July, 1855 (Washington: George S. Gideon, 1855), 68; Find A Grave, "Anthony H. Clements (October 1, 1820 - January 1, 1896)," Memorial #49657356, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=49657356 (accessed June 27, 2017); Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1.
